attributes.action: Ensure that the author Terry Pratchett recieves a Knighthood in this years Honours list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like the prime minister to put pressure on to ensure that Terry Pratchett, author of the best selling Disc World series of novels, is included in this years honours list to receive a knighthood both in recognition for his services to literature and also for his work for both Orangutang Charities and more recently for Alzheimers Charities (to which Mr Pratchett has personally pledged £500,000.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
